subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson locked up his third consecutive championship with a solid 15th-place finish, joining Cale Yarborough as the only drivers to win three straight Cup titles.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson locked up his third consecutive championship with a solid 15th-place finish, joining Cale Yarborough as the only drivers to win three straight Cup titles.
